text: Does Python work in larger teams?
I read this post last night and it got me thinking.
I like python and "batteries", pypi and such.
But I've only done python solo.
Never tried it in a team.
Are the points that Ted mentions valid?
If they are how do teams cope with them?
Does Python work in teams or even large teams?
I personally see the problems he mentions when I come back to my old code.
Even when working with other modules sometimes I need to peek inside.
I would like to hear people with experience on this.
